reviews.sentence: Great experience. My son won tickets to an Avalanche hockey game so we went on a road trip. The staff was great at check in. We were laughing with them and they seemed to try to connect with us. They helped with directions to events we wanted to try while in Denver. The room was clean. The location was fabulous. The views from the spa were breathtaking. I would absolutely recommend this hotel. Next time I visit it will be with my wife on a weekend getaway. Location and views as well as just a great all around experience. Promenade skating rink was fun. Unser kart racing at the junction of US36 and I25 was awesome. The restaurants BJs and Dave and Busters. There were minor things needed attention about the physical structure but nothing except the ordinary maintenance.

Needs Some TLC. Hotel is in a great location in Westminster and looks good from the outside. The staff we met with and served us were great. The inside however needs some TLC. Not that we are clean fanatics but there is an expectation of a very clean hotel when the chain is a Westin. First off its not dirty. Not that we would not stay there again but would check the Mariot first. Heres what we saw 1 the patio outside is filthy. Food stains all over the ground. Including wherer you eat. Needs a good power wash. Weekly. And the sofas and chairs in this area were so dirty we would not sit on them. Too bad because it is nice out there 2 elevators were noticeably dirty especially in the corners indicating a quick vac only. 3 dirty glasses noticed on tables by the elevators for over a day. Separately we were put on the 2nd floor which not only is the pool access floor but also has meeting dining facilities. Hope the attendees do not order fish. And not for nothing but 11 day for wifi. And my bill says I earned 0 starpoints for this stay. Is that because I booked on Expedia. We had not stayed in a Westin for a while and if this one is representative. Like I said our staff interactions were all pleasant. Especially our breakfast waitress and the maintenance guy. Great restaurants in the area. See above.

Gorgeous hotel great staff. The staff were great and the building is very nice. Tub was a little outdated but the rest of the bathroom was modern and updated. No airport shuttle. Front desk recommended SuperShutle or a town car service. We opted for the town car service and booked through the front desk. Ended up costing 50 more than they told us it would. Restaurant was awesome. Served locally sourced food in traditional recipes for the areas culture. Only spent time at the conference center. Conference wifi works all over the hotel but costs per device per day. Guest wifi only works in rooms but was easier to use and expensive. Cash grab.
Proximity to the PromenadeIt needs some updating. Heater fan ran all night and could not be turned off.

Fair. Very pretty lobby. The first room they gave us smelled like cat urine. So they changed us to another room with a mountain view. The toilet in that room was clogged. Maintenance came up to fix it and when we used it the next time it was clothes again.

The front desk staff was very helpful. The desk manager and general manager were helpful in a difficult situation. The maintenance staff or helpful in cleaning up the broken glass from our car. Our car was broken into irreplaceable items were stolen along with another guest. My suggestion for that nice of an area hotel would either have security or put in security cameras. We were told that the same thing happened the week before.
Westin Westminster. Staff excellent. Price high for hotel which is a remodel and not so up to date in certain areas.

Nice location and property if a bit worn. Property was ina great location and had good amenities. Property was worn needs general maintenance. They must have tons of people going through it for how worn it feels.
Beautiful Hotel. outside of the congestion from the lobby remodel taking place everything was perfect.

Hotel room shuffle. First room we checked into had a leaky toilet and TV was n’t working. Maintenance was n’t able to fix right away and after complaining we were moved to another room which was fine however the inconvenience was annoying for sure. Maintenance folks were fixing floor just off the elevator which should have been done early in the morning however not in the middle of the day too much traffic. Overall it was a decent hotel I expected a bit more.

Beautiful area and property. Recently renovated beautiful area and very nice. Room was great and super comfortable. A little hiccup checking in with one front desk lady being hateful with several people but all the other staff were amazing. Valet Karsh was awesome. Looking forward to another visit.
Newly remodeled with an updated and eloquent feel. We ca n’t give it 4 stars because the walls seemed much thinner than normal. Every toilet flush blow dryer and conversation in the hall was heard.
Updated comfortable room. Excellent location to restaurants and shopping. Beautiful view of the mountains.
Recently renovated rooms are wonderful. We were upgraded to Mountain View ’s that we enjoyed.
I love staying here. It checks all the boxes. clean updated comfortable great staff location and my dog loves it. There are great walking paths.
Exceptional. Location clean updated rooms. Nothing.

Weekend family trip. It was a super nice hote. Very comfortable the bathroom needs to be updated a little. The paint in the tub was peeling and the side of the sink needs a good cleaning. The service desk was amazing lots of eating places very close by. Would stay here sgain.
This is a very modern and updated property. Everything that we used was in good and clean working order.
Flying ants and spiders in the bathroom as well as a light fixture that had to be repaired shortly after checking in.
Clean Nice Staff nice remodel except for the new old furniture there is a reason that style went out it is ugly.
